nodes.text: Death Troopers: Recovered Messages from Purge
Death Troopers: Recovered Messages from Purge was a series of online letters that were released on various websites on September 10, 2009, as a tie-in to the then upcoming novel Death Troopers.

The letters were released over various different Star Wars fan sites: Club Jade, Deathtroopers.com, TheForce.net, the New Jedi Order Encyclopedia, Rebelscum.com, StarWars.com, and StarWarsActionNews.com, with different letters being published on each site. Nine messages were posted in total, spanning the seven sites, three of which were posted on StarWars.com.
The following messages were recovered from the Imperial Prison Barge Purge, after its discovery in the Unknown Regions.

With the exception of certain elements that have been redacted upon the request of specific parties or individuals, these letters and notations are presented here unedited, with their original spelling and syntax intact, in the interest of galactic scholarship.
